original_text: And the priest shall make atonement for all the congregation of the people of Israel, and they shall be forgiven, because it was a mistake, and they have brought their offering, a food offering to the Lord, and their sin offering before the Lord for their mistake.
korean_text: 제사장이 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중을 위하여 속죄하면 그들이 사함을 받으리니 이는 그가 부지중에 범죄함이며 또 부지중에 범죄함으로 말미암아 헌물 곧 화제와 속죄제를 여호와께 드렸음이라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall make atonement
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 속죄를 해야 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: for all the congregation of the people of Israel
and they have brought their offering
a food offering to the Lord
and their sin offering before the Lord
